posts.title: Docker相关命令总结
posts.text: Docker相关命令Docker清理相关命令docker rm {continer id}删除容器docker rmi {images id}删除镜像 Docker运行容器镜像指令docker run -itv {宿主机路径}:{docker容器路径} {镜像id}

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Ubuntu_bash
posts.text: Ubuntu相关命令总结Cat命令cat |tail -n 10000 filename1 > filename2 输出file1文档内容前10000到file2文档cat |head -n 10000 lk201806.txt > lk_demo.csvcat |tail -n 10000 lk201806.txt > lk_demo.csv 进程命令列出所有在进行的进程ps -a关闭username的所有进程killall {username} 文件相关命令列出当前路径下文件的大小并排序du -sh * | sort -n查看指定文件大小du -sk filename
